DOC.brief_summary: Research on the synergistic effect of corticosteroids and beta-agonists on the cytokine production in COPD patients. Blood will be obtained from healthy volunteers and COPD patients and blood monocytes will be stimulated to produce cytokines with or without the prementioned drugs.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation on the Role of Corticosteroids and Beta-Agonists on Cytokine Production in COPD Patients
DOC.criteria: clinical COPD smoking age > 40 years age < 40 years use of antibiotics, corticosteroids or betaagonists
